definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
making up a group, forming a troupe (idiom); in large numbers/as a large crowd

sentences.english: The staff trooped through the gaily decorated court.
sentences.chinese: 全體工作人同結隊走過張燈結綵的院子。

sentences.english: Of course there are still some certain group-forming tendencies.
sentences.chinese: 當然，它們仍然有某些成羣結隊的傾向。

sentences.english: Health in the central part of the island to a famous temple monkeys, and monkeys in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在島中部的生宜有著名的猴子廟，猴子成羣結隊。

sentences.english: People are thronging to see his new play .
sentences.chinese: 人們成羣結隊地去看他那出新戲。

sentences.english: The spectators trooped out of the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆成羣結隊地走出體育場。

sentences.english: Kin-folk come to see Yvonne by the dozen.
sentences.chinese: 親友們成羣結隊來看伊娃擠得水泄不通。

sentences.english: A flocking bird is blind to the grace and cohesiveness of a flock in flight.
sentences.chinese: 結隊飛行的鳥對飛行姿勢和凝聚力是視而不見的。

sentences.english: From all over the pond, they came swimming by dozens.
sentences.chinese: 從池塘的各個角落，它們成羣結隊的游過來。

sentences.english: The next morning the whole family trooped in to watch the performance.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨全家人結隊來到起居室看我表演。

sentences.english: Chinese White Dolphins live together and move in groups.
sentences.chinese: 中華白海豚是羣居動物，經常聯羣結隊活動。

sentences.english: The next morning the whole family trooped in to watch the performance.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨全家人結隊離開起居室看我表演。

sentences.english: But visitors should beware of pickpockets who often work in teams.
sentences.chinese: 但遊客要小心那裏成羣結隊的小偷。

sentences.english: This summer, people flocked to the swimming pool to keep cool during the heat wave.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，人們成羣結隊來到泳池納涼，躲避熱浪。

sentences.english: Crowds of young demonstrators protested against the increase in students' fees.
sentences.chinese: 成羣結隊的年輕示威者們抗議增加學費。

sentences.english: Groups of spotted eagle rays cruise around the pinnacles.
sentences.chinese: 斑點鷹魟成羣結隊在石筍周圍漫遊。

sentences.english: Vistors came in flocks to see the new bridge.
sentences.chinese: 參觀者成羣結隊地來觀看這座新橋。
